distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for postgresql94 fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-1058: Fixed uncontrolled search path element in pg_dump and other client applications (bsc#1081925).


Bug fixes:

- See release notes for details:
  * https://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.4/static/release-9-4-17.html
  * https://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.4/static/release-9-4-16.html
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A flaw was found in the way Postgresql allowed a user to modify the behavior of a query for other users. An attacker with a user account could use this flaw to execute code with the permissions of superuser in the database. Versions 9.3 through 10 are affected.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
